languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс меняется в лице.{/n} "Правильно ли я вас расслышал, губернатор Вьятт: прямо сейчас при вашем дворе находится некий таинственный и сверхъестественно искусный в стрельбе мутант высокого роста и субтильной комплекции? Вас ничего не смутило в появлении такого помощника?"

{n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс меняется в лице.{/n} "Правильно ли я вас расслышал, губернатор Вьятт: прямо сейчас при вашем дворе находится некий таинственный и сверхъестественно искусный в стрельбе мутант высокого роста и субтильной комплекции? Вас ничего не смутило в появлении такого помощника?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

{n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

{n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

{n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希的表情发生了变化。{/n}“我没听错吧，维亚特总督？此时此刻，你的庄园里有一位神秘的变种人。这个人身高惊人、体态轻盈，而且射击水平极为高超？突然凭空出现了这样一位帮手，难道你就没有好好想想吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的表情发生了变化。{/n}“我没听错吧，维亚特总督？此时此刻，你的庄园里有一位神秘的变种人。这个人身高惊人、体态轻盈，而且射击水平极为高超？突然凭空出现了这样一位帮手，难道你就没有好好想想吗？”

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix cambia.{/n} «¿Le he oído bien, gobernadora Vyatt? ¿Tiene ahora mismo en su finca a una mutante misteriosa? Una de altura prodigiosa y cuerpo esbelto y que posee una aptitud sobrenatural para el tiro? ¿Y acaso la llegada de esta ayudante no le dio qué pensar?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión de Heinrix cambia.{/n} «¿Le he oído bien, gobernadora Vyatt? ¿Tiene ahora mismo en su finca a una mutante misteriosa? Una de altura prodigiosa y cuerpo esbelto y que posee una aptitud sobrenatural para el tiro? ¿Y acaso la llegada de esta ayudante no le dio qué pensar?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顔つきが険しくなる。{/n}「正確な話を、ビャット総督。謎の変異体を今この瞬間にも屋敷に置いているということですか？異様に背が高く、細身体型、それに射撃の才は神業級だと？この協力者がやってきたときに、一息置いて考えなかったのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顔つきが険しくなる。{/n}「正確な話を、ビャット総督。謎の変異体を今この瞬間にも屋敷に置いているということですか？異様に背が高く、細身体型、それに射撃の才は神業級だと？この協力者がやってきたときに、一息置いて考えなかったのですか？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Ausdruck verändert sich.{/n} "Habe ich das richtig verstanden, Gouverneurin Vyatt: In diesem Moment hält sich eine geheimnisvolle Mutantin auf Eurem Anwesen auf? Sehr groß, schlanke Figur und eine übernatürlich gute Schützin? Hat Euch die Ankunft dieser Helferin nie ins Grübeln gebracht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Ausdruck verändert sich.{/n} "Habe ich das richtig verstanden, Gouverneurin Vyatt: In diesem Moment hält sich eine geheimnisvolle Mutantin auf Eurem Anwesen auf? Sehr groß, schlanke Figur und eine übernatürlich gute Schützin? Hat Euch die Ankunft dieser Helferin nie ins Grübeln gebracht?"

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'Heinrix change.{/n} « Ai-je bien entendu, gouverneure Vyatt ? Une mystérieuse mutante se trouve dans votre domaine en ce moment même ? Une femme singulièrement grande, mince et douée d'un talent surnaturel pour le tir ? Et à aucun moment vous ne vous êtes posé de questions à son sujet ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'Heinrix change.{/n} « Ai-je bien entendu, gouverneure Vyatt ? Une mystérieuse mutante se trouve dans votre domaine en ce moment même ? Une femme singulièrement grande, mince et douée d'un talent surnaturel pour le tir ? Et à aucun moment vous ne vous êtes posé de questions à son sujet ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in yüz ifadesi değişiyor.{/n} "Doğru mu duydum Vali Vyatt? Şu anda konağınızda gizemli bir mutant mı var? Şaşılacak boyda, narin yapılı ve doğaüstü bir atış yeteneğine sahip birisi yani. Böyle bir yardımın ansız gelişi sizi hiç düşündürmedi mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's expression shifts.{/n} "Did I hear you correctly, Governor Vyatt: you have a mysterious mutant on your estate at this very moment? One of prodigious height, slight build, and with a supernatural talent for shooting? Did the arrival of this helper never give you pause for thought?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in yüz ifadesi değişiyor.{/n} "Sizi doğru mu duydum Vali Vyatt? Şu anda malikânenizde gizemli bir mutant mı var? Şaşılacak boyda, hafif yapılı ve doğaüstü bir atış yeteneğine sahip birisi yani. Böyle bir yardımın ansız gelişi sizi hiç düşündürmedi mi?"
